name: GiftSuggestions
0:
”Alexa, ask Gift Suggestions to suggest a gift”
”I would like a gift idea.”
”Give me an idea for a gift.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gift suggestions
des: The Gift Suggestions skill is to help people who are having trouble thinking of things to get their friends or families for Christmas. Upon being prompted to, it will give random ideas for gifts out of a list. This skill doesn't require any special software or permissions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
